translation.start.narration:
Welcome to the Alexa Quiz Game.  
        <break time='0.5s'/> 
        Let's get ready for today's show, which is 3 questions long and has an estimated duration of 5 minutes. 
        <break time='0.5s'/>
translation.opponentIntro.narration:
You will be playing against your opponent, {opponentName}. Good luck to both of you. 
        <break time='1s'/>
translation.Q.reprompt: Is the answer A, {answerA}, B, {answerB}, or C {answerC}
translation.scoringUpdateGainedPoints.narration:
Yay! You gained {gainedPointsThisRound} points for a new total of {playerPoints} points. 
        || 
        Great job! You gained {gainedPointsThisRound} points and now have {playerPoints} points. 
        || 
        Very good! You now have {playerPoints} points total.
translation.scoringUpdateOpponentCorrect.narration:
Your opponent {opponentName} got the answer correct and now has {opponentPoints} points. 
        || 
        Your opponent was correct for {answerPointsValue} points. 
        || 
        Your opponent got the answer right.
translation.scoringUpdateOpponentWrong.narration:
Your opponent {opponentName} got the answer wrong. 
        || 
        Your opponent {opponentName} was incorrect.
translation.quizOver.narration: <break time='0.5s'/> The quiz is over, let's see how you did. <audio src='https://sfb-framework.s3.amazonaws.com/examples/sounds/Fairy_1.mp3'/> Today, you scored {playerPoints} points. <break time='0.5s'/> Your opponent {opponentName} scored {opponentPoints} points.
translation.quizOverTied.narration: Oh boy, it was a tie. What a close game today.
translation.quizOverLost.narration:
<audio src='https://sfb-framework.s3.amazonaws.com/examples/sounds/Boing_1.mp3'/>  
         
        Oh no, you lost. Better luck next time.
translation.quizOverWon.narration:
<audio src='https://sfb-framework.s3.amazonaws.com/examples/sounds/Bell_1.mp3'/>  
         
        Yay! You won! Way to go.
translation.quizOverExit.narration: <break time='1s'/> I hope you had fun, thank you very much for playing today. See you tomorrow for your next Alexa Quiz Game.
translation.resume.narration: Welcome back. Would you like to start where you left off?
translation.help.narration: This is a multiple choice quiz game. For each question, please choose answer A, B, or C. If you need to repeat a question, say 'repeat the question'. If you don't know the answer, you can say 'i don't know' or 'skip'.
translation.q.reprompt: Is the answer A, {answerA}, B, {answerB}, or C {answerC}
